meta-review.comment: Resident Evil 2 is the ultimate zombie-slaying nostalgia trip that's been resurrected with stunning visuals and captivating gameplay. Whether you're a die-hard fan of the original or a newcomer to the series, this remake hits all the right marks, offering a spine-chilling experience that's both nostalgic and refreshingly new. The thrill of exploring the dilapidated ruins of Raccoon City and engaging in intense zombie combat is an absolute rush. Capcom has truly set a new standard for remakes, creating a game that not only captures the essence of the original but also delivers an even more compelling experience. Whether you're a seasoned zombie hunter or a first-timer, Resident Evil 2 delivers an exceptional, must-play gaming experience.
